name: Ice-cream survival
description:
Gameplay video -


Try to keep the Ice-cream safe as long as possible from dangers like the sun, bird poop, a cookie, and a button.

Every 5 seconds, you get 1 point that gets added to your score on how long you last

Controls to avoid dangers: 

space bar to avoid sun

up arrow to avoid bird poop

3 button to avoid cookie

click on the button quickly as to not get a game over
